definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: Each lamination contains an effective recording layer made of rewritable phase change material.
sentences.chinese: 每个叠层中都包括可重写相变材料制的有效记录层。

sentences.english: Stromatolites were the first to exhale oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石是最先释放氧气的。

sentences.english: The material choice of triple junction high-efficiency solar cells.
sentences.chinese: 叠层三结高效太阳电池材料的选定。

sentences.english: Blades built up laminated hardwood and pine with ply covering overlain by glued fabric.
sentences.chinese: 刀片建立了覆盖层的叠层胶织物覆硬木和松树。

sentences.english: The oxygen exhaled by those stromatolites is what we all breathe today.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石所散发出的氧气正是我们今天所呼吸的。

sentences.english: Examination's folding a battery slice in layer has already had no miscellaneous quality and damaged phenomenon ;
sentences.chinese: 检测叠层后的电池片有无杂质及破损现象。

sentences.english: Besides, the design principle of prestressed laminated truss are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 同时，介绍了预应力叠层桁架的设计原则。

sentences.english: But lamination makes fabricating glass for structural uses very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是叠层结构使得玻璃的制造过程十分繁复。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the growing process of columnar stromatolites.
sentences.chinese: 本文就柱状叠层石的生长过程作一简要的分析。

sentences.english: BIL located between pile caps and the super structure, mainly consisting of laminated rubber bearings and viscous dampers.
sentences.chinese: 隔震层由叠层橡胶隔震支座和粘滞阻尼器组成。

sentences.english: As only one kind of fossil in Proterozoic, stromatolite is an important material in the paleogeography changing study.
sentences.chinese: 元古代叠层石是研究古地理变化的重要材料。

sentences.english: Stromatolites are the heroes in my story.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石是我故事里的英雄。

sentences.english: He also thought stromatolites were organic in origin.
sentences.chinese: 他还认为叠层石是有机体的来源。

definition: to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
